channel.title: CVE Feed for TAPHOME -- Core Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TAPHOME -- Core Platform

item.title: CVE-2023-2760|2024-08-02T06:33:05.394Z -- taphome -- core%20platform
item.description: An SQL injection vulnerability exists in TapHome core HandleMessageUpdateDevicePropertiesRequest function before version 2023.2, allowing low privileged users to inject arbitrary SQL directives into an SQL query and execute arbitrary SQL commands and get full reading access. This may also lead to limited write access and temporary Denial-of-Service.

item.title: CVE-2023-2759|2024-08-02T06:33:05.760Z -- taphome -- core%20platform
item.description: A hidden API exists in TapHome's core platform before version 2023.2 that allows an authenticated, low privileged user to change passwords of other users without any prior knowledge. The attacker may gain full access to the device by using this vulnerability.
